column2: select top # pl.playerId, pl.nameFirst, pl.nameLast, t.yearId, t.teamId, f.* from baseball.players pl inner join baseball.appearances p on p.playerId = pl.playerId join baseball.teams t on t.teamId = p.teamId and t.yearid = p.yearid join baseball.teamsfranchises f on f.franchid = t.franchid
